attributes.action: All MPs are urged to not support a motion to trigger Article 50 of Lisbon Treaty
attributes.additional_details:
Link to Professor A C Grayling's letter to all MPs delivered to them on 1st July 2016. 
https://www.nchlondon.ac.uk/2016/07/01/professor-c-graylings-letter-650-mps-urging-parliament-not-support-motion-trigger-article-50-lisbon-treaty-1-july-2016/
attributes.background: This petition is in support of the letter of Professor A C Grayling which was delivered to all 650 MPs on 1st July 2016. The letter goes into full detail all the reasons why Parliament are urged to not support a motion to trigger Article 50 of The Lisbon Treaty.
